posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.title: Introduce myself
posts.text: New Citizen In East of Chinawhen I was a young boy in high school, I image a world under my pen.when I was a adult struggling in the fantasy world ,I image a world with my keyboard.I was born in a small village ,and now I continuing my career in east of china where people call Yangtze Delta,and at this moment 01.19.2018, I take place as a data engeneer in data department of a middle size company which is focused in spreading infomation in Med and Bio.and write Python mainly. My StudyI have earned a BS degree in Industrial Engineering,and I want to earn a Master degree of applied Math in Tsinghua University,It’s on the top of my list.

posts.title: my view on society
posts.text: I am a big fan of Friedrich Hayek, the most famous anti-totalitarian Austrian Economist and Thinker in 20th century .What I am focusing on is his master peice The Road to Serfdom
